GSD.description:
net: fix refcount bug in sk_psock_get (2)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.65 by commit a5d1cb908131e939bd8b63b8e5e23365bbc2edaf. For more details please see the references link.
